enriched.description: Stemnovate is a biotech company focused on stem cell research and regenerative medicine applications. The company develops innovative cell therapy technologies for treating various diseases.
enriched.tech_keywords: stem cells, cell therapy, regenerative medicine, biotechnology

enriched.description: STORM Therapeutics is a biotech company specializing in RNA therapeutics, leveraging synthetic biology to develop novel treatments. The company focuses on addressing unmet medical needs through RNA-based approaches.
enriched.tech_keywords: RNA therapeutics, synthetic biology, molecular medicine

enriched.description: Talisman Therapeutics develops cell therapy and regenerative medicine treatments for serious diseases. The company combines advanced biology with therapeutic development to create novel treatments.
TRx Biosciences is a research and development company specializing in biotech solutions and pharmaceutical development. The company provides research services and develops therapeutic compounds.
enriched.tech_keywords: drug development, biomedical research, therapeutic development

enriched.description: Xap Therapeutics is a biopharmaceutical company focused on developing therapeutic compounds for cancer and other serious diseases. The company uses proprietary technology to identify and develop novel treatments.

Zoetis is a global leader in animal health, developing medicines, vaccines, and diagnostic products for pets, livestock, and poultry. The company operates in over 180 countries with significant research presence in Cambridge.

The Wellcome Sanger Institute is a world-leading independent research institute focused on genomics, genetics, and molecular biology. It conducts foundational research and advances in genome biology with global impact.

The European Bioinformatics Institute is an international bioinformatics research organization providing data resources and bioinformatics services to the scientific community. It operates as a research institute of the European Molecular Biology Laboratory.
enriched.tech_keywords: bioinformatics, sequence databases, computational biology, software

enriched.description: Wellcome Connecting Science is a program focused on improving science communication and public engagement with science. It funds initiatives that connect scientists with society and support science education.
BioData Innovation Centre is a technology hub focused on biodata and bioinformatics innovation. The centre supports the development of data-driven solutions for biotech and healthcare applications.
enriched.tech_keywords: bioinformatics, data analytics, machine learning, biotechnology

enriched.description: Abbexa Ltd is a life sciences company supplying research reagents, antibodies, and biochemical tools to the research community. The company manufactures high-quality products for molecular biology and immunology research.

Agenus UK Ltd (part of Agenus) is a biopharmaceutical company specializing in immunotherapy and cancer treatment development. The company develops therapeutic vaccines and immune checkpoint modulators.
Ai Vivo Ltd is a biotech company combining AI and biotechnology to develop novel therapeutics. The company uses machine learning to accelerate drug discovery and development processes.
enriched.tech_keywords: artificial intelligence, drug discovery, machine learning, biotechnology

enriched.description: Alan Boswell Group is an insurance services company providing commercial and specialty insurance products. The company serves various industries with customized insurance solutions.
Alianza is a data and technology company providing information services and analytics solutions. The company specializes in data intelligence and business solutions for enterprises.
Altium is a leading provider of electronic design and manufacturing software used by engineers globally. The company develops CAD tools for PCB design, 3D design, and manufacturing collaboration.
enriched.tech_keywords: CAD software, PCB design, electronics, manufacturing

enriched.description: AMD Limited is a semiconductor company designing processors and graphics solutions for computing, gaming, and data center applications. The company is a major player in CPU and GPU markets globally.

Amgen is one of the world's largest independent biopharmaceutical companies. It discovers, develops, manufactures, and delivers human therapeutics focusing on oncology, cardiovascular disease, and other serious illnesses.
Analog Devices is a semiconductor company specializing in analog, mixed-signal, and digital signal processing integrated circuits. The company serves industrial, communications, and consumer markets.

Astex Pharmaceuticals is a biopharmaceutical company developing small-molecule oncology therapeutics. The company uses proprietary fragment-based drug discovery technology to create novel cancer treatments.

AVEVA is an industrial software company (part of Schneider Electric) providing engineering and operations solutions for asset-intensive industries. The company develops CAD, PLM, and data analytics software.
enriched.tech_keywords: industrial software, CAD, PLM, data analytics, engineering

enriched.description: Bulgin is an electronics components manufacturer specializing in connectors and switches for industrial applications. The company produces robust interconnect solutions for harsh environments.
Bango is a fintech company providing mobile commerce solutions and payment technologies. The company operates a platform enabling digital commerce and subscription management globally.
enriched.tech_keywords: mobile commerce, payments, fintech, subscription management

enriched.description: Bard Pharmaceuticals Ltd is a pharmaceutical company developing specialty medicines. The company focuses on bringing innovative treatments to market in various therapeutic areas.
Bayer CropScience is the agricultural biotechnology division of Bayer, developing crop protection and seed innovations. The company focuses on sustainable agriculture and food security solutions.
enriched.tech_keywords: agricultural biotechnology, crop protection, seeds, sustainable agriculture

enriched.description: Beko is a consumer appliances manufacturer producing refrigerators, washing machines, and other home appliances. The company operates globally with manufacturing and design facilities worldwide.

Biofidelity Ltd is a biomedical research company specializing in biomechanics, musculoskeletal research, and medical device testing. The company provides research services and develops biomechanical models.
BOXERsolutions Ltd is a business solutions company providing software and consulting services. The company develops and implements enterprise software solutions for various industries.
BRDG is a data science and analytics company providing insights and solutions for business intelligence. The company specializes in building data-driven applications and analytics platforms.
enriched.tech_keywords: data analytics, business intelligence, machine learning

enriched.description: Broadcom Ltd is a major semiconductor company designing and supplying infrastructure software and broadband connectivity solutions. The company serves data center, broadband, and enterprise markets globally.

Cambridge Consultants is a leading technology consulting firm providing engineering, product development, and innovation services. The company works across sectors including healthcare, consumer, industrial, and communications.
enriched.tech_keywords: technology consulting, product development, engineering, innovation

enriched.description: Cambridge Digital Health is a digital health startup focused on healthcare technology and innovation. The company develops solutions to improve healthcare delivery and patient outcomes.
enriched.tech_keywords: digital health, healthcare technology, medical software

enriched.description: Cambridge Flow Solutions is an engineering company specializing in fluid dynamics, computational modeling, and engineering analysis. The company provides solutions for thermal and fluid flow applications.
enriched.tech_keywords: fluid dynamics, computational modeling, engineering software

enriched.description: Cambridge Future Tech is a venture support and technology innovation organization promoting emerging technologies and entrepreneurship. The organization fosters development of next-generation tech companies.
Cambridge Heartwear is a medtech startup developing wearable cardiac monitoring devices. The company combines advanced electronics and medical expertise to create next-generation cardiac wearables.
enriched.tech_keywords: wearable devices, cardiac monitoring, medical electronics

enriched.description: Cambridge Mechatronics is an advanced actuators and motion control company developing innovative mechanical systems. The company creates precision actuators for robotics, aerospace, and industrial applications.
Cambridge Touch Technologies is a developer of advanced touch interface technologies. The company creates innovative touch sensing and display solutions for consumer and industrial applications.

Cerevance is a neuroscience biotech company developing novel therapeutics for neurological and psychiatric disorders. The company uses proprietary biology to identify and develop brain-targeted treatments.

Citrix Systems UK Ltd (part of Citrix) is an enterprise software company providing virtualization, networking, and cloud solutions. The company develops software enabling secure workspace access and application delivery.
enriched.tech_keywords: virtualization, cloud computing, enterprise software, cybersecurity

enriched.description: CN-Bio Innovations is a biotech company developing organ-on-chip and organoid technologies for drug development and research. The company creates advanced tools for in vitro biology and disease modeling.
enriched.tech_keywords: organ-on-chip, organoids, biotech instrumentation, drug testing

enriched.description: Creasallis is a technology company with focus on software solutions and digital transformation. The company develops enterprise and business applications for various sectors.
CS Genetics is a genetics research company providing genomic services and analysis tools. The company specializes in DNA sequencing and genetic data interpretation for research and diagnostics.
enriched.tech_keywords: genomics, DNA sequencing, genetic analysis, bioinformatics

enriched.description: CW (Cambridge Wireless Ltd) is an industry association and membership organization for wireless and broadband technology companies. The organization provides networking, business intelligence, and industry support.

Dassault Systèmes Ltd is a leading 3D software company providing design, engineering, and lifecycle management solutions. The company develops software for product innovation across aerospace, automotive, manufacturing, and other industries.
enriched.tech_keywords: 3D design, CAD, PLM, simulation software, digital manufacturing
